The file content with the documentation metadata removed is:

<ProgramListing>

<Link id="l00001" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//=- AArch64ConditionOptimizer.cpp - Remove useless comparisons for AArch64 -=//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00002" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00003" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Part of the LLVM Project, under the Apache License v2.0 with LLVM Exceptions.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00004" /><CodeLine lineNumber="4"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// See https://llvm.org/LICENSE.txt for license information.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00005" /><CodeLine lineNumber="5"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// SPDX-License-Identifier: Apache-2.0 WITH LLVM-exception</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00006" /><CodeLine lineNumber="6"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00007" /><CodeLine lineNumber="7"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00008" /><CodeLine lineNumber="8"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00009" /><CodeLine lineNumber="9"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This pass tries to make consecutive compares of values use same operands to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00010" /><CodeLine lineNumber="10"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// allow CSE pass to remove duplicated instructions.  For this it analyzes</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00011" /><CodeLine lineNumber="11"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// branches and adjusts comparisons with immediate values by converting:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00012" /><CodeLine lineNumber="12"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  &#42; GE -&gt; GT</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00013" /><CodeLine lineNumber="13"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  &#42; GT -&gt; GE</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00014" /><CodeLine lineNumber="14"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  &#42; LT -&gt; LE</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00015" /><CodeLine lineNumber="15"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  &#42; LE -&gt; LT</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00016" /><CodeLine lineNumber="16"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// and adjusting immediate values appropriately.  It basically corrects two</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00017" /><CodeLine lineNumber="17"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// immediate values towards each other to make them equal.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00018" /><CodeLine lineNumber="18"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00019" /><CodeLine lineNumber="19"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Consider the following example in C:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00020" /><CodeLine lineNumber="20"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00021" /><CodeLine lineNumber="21"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   if ((a &lt; 5 &amp;&amp; ...) || (a &gt; 5 &amp;&amp; ...)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00022" /><CodeLine lineNumber="22"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//        ~~~~~             ~~~~~</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00023" /><CodeLine lineNumber="23"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//          ^                 ^</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00024" /><CodeLine lineNumber="24"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//          x                 y</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00025" /><CodeLine lineNumber="25"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00026" /><CodeLine lineNumber="26"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Here both &quot;x&quot; and &quot;y&quot; expressions compare &quot;a&quot; with &quot;5&quot;.  When &quot;x&quot; evaluates</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00027" /><CodeLine lineNumber="27"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// to &quot;false&quot;, &quot;y&quot; can just check flags set by the first comparison.  As a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00028" /><CodeLine lineNumber="28"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// result of the canonicalization employed by</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00029" /><CodeLine lineNumber="29"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// SelectionDAGBuilder::visitSwitchCase, DAGCombine, and other target-specific</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00030" /><CodeLine lineNumber="30"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// code, assembly ends up in the form that is not CSE friendly:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00031" /><CodeLine lineNumber="31"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00032" /><CodeLine lineNumber="32"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     ...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00033" /><CodeLine lineNumber="33"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     cmp      w8, #4</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00034" /><CodeLine lineNumber="34"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     b.gt     .LBB0&#95;3</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00035" /><CodeLine lineNumber="35"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     ...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00036" /><CodeLine lineNumber="36"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   .LBB0&#95;3:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00037" /><CodeLine lineNumber="37"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     cmp      w8, #6</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00038" /><CodeLine lineNumber="38"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     b.lt     .LBB0&#95;6</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00039" /><CodeLine lineNumber="39"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     ...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00040" /><CodeLine lineNumber="40"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00041" /><CodeLine lineNumber="41"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Same assembly after the pass:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00042" /><CodeLine lineNumber="42"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00043" /><CodeLine lineNumber="43"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     ...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00044" /><CodeLine lineNumber="44"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     cmp      w8, #5</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00045" /><CodeLine lineNumber="45"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     b.ge     .LBB0&#95;3</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00046" /><CodeLine lineNumber="46"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     ...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00047" /><CodeLine lineNumber="47"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   .LBB0&#95;3:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00048" /><CodeLine lineNumber="48"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     cmp      w8, #5     // &lt;-- CSE pass removes this instruction</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00049" /><CodeLine lineNumber="49"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     b.le     .LBB0&#95;6</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00050" /><CodeLine lineNumber="50"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     ...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00051" /><CodeLine lineNumber="51"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00052" /><CodeLine lineNumber="52"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Currently only SUBS and ADDS followed by b.?? are supported.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00053" /><CodeLine lineNumber="53"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00054" /><CodeLine lineNumber="54"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// TODO: maybe handle TBNZ/TBZ the same way as CMP when used instead for &quot;a &lt; 0&quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00055" /><CodeLine lineNumber="55"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// TODO: handle other conditional instructions (e.g. CSET)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00056" /><CodeLine lineNumber="56"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// TODO: allow second branching to be anything if it doesn&#39;t require adjusting</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00057" /><CodeLine lineNumber="57"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00058" /><CodeLine lineNumber="58"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00059" /><CodeLine lineNumber="59"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00060" /><CodeLine lineNumber="60"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#include &quot;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64-h">AArch64.h</a>&quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00061" /><CodeLine lineNumber="61"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#include &quot;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/lib/target/aarch64/mctargetdesc/aarch64addressingmodes-h">MCTargetDesc/AArch64AddressingModes.h</a>&quot;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00242" /><CodeLine lineNumber="242"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// operator and condition code.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00243" /><CodeLine lineNumber="243" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-aarch64conditionoptimizer-cpp-/aarch64conditionoptimizer/#ae5ced970396c0f7c3cb7644340597544"><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-aarch64conditionoptimizer-cpp-/aarch64conditionoptimizer/#a6d2a5db52a3d254a6823b57f11e41cc3">AArch64ConditionOptimizer::CmpInfo</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-aarch64conditionoptimizer-cpp-/aarch64conditionoptimizer/#ae5ced970396c0f7c3cb7644340597544">AArch64ConditionOptimizer::adjustCmp</a>(</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00245" /><CodeLine lineNumber="245"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Opc = CmpMI-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr/#a0363204b5fbab08a46f5a7cd7f376f78">getOpcode</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00246" /><CodeLine lineNumber="246"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00247" /><CodeLine lineNumber="247"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// CMN (compare with negative immediate) is an alias to ADDS (as</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00248" /><CodeLine lineNumber="248"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &quot;operand - negative&quot; == &quot;operand + positive&quot;)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00249" /><CodeLine lineNumber="249"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Negative = (Opc == AArch64::ADDSWri || Opc == AArch64::ADDSXri);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00250" /><CodeLine lineNumber="250"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00251" /><CodeLine lineNumber="251"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Correction = (Cmp == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/aarch64cc/#abfa1f7dce576430da99eed57807c7f28a91a0c1b4eac415607c4ceb0a899c4629">AArch64CC::GT</a>) ? 1 : -1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00252" /><CodeLine lineNumber="252"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Negate Correction value for comparison with negative immediate (CMN).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00253" /><CodeLine lineNumber="253"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Negative) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00254" /><CodeLine lineNumber="254"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Correction = -Correction;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00255" /><CodeLine lineNumber="255"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00256" /><CodeLine lineNumber="256"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00257" /><CodeLine lineNumber="257"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> OldImm = (int)CmpMI-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr/#ad67c9230577a0b640c52852c75c93939">getOperand</a>(2).<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand/#a38b28a85f818b49d8806c150b8a5b4f7">getImm</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00258" /><CodeLine lineNumber="258"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NewImm = std::abs(OldImm + Correction);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00259" /><CodeLine lineNumber="259"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00260" /><CodeLine lineNumber="260"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Handle +0 -&gt; -1 and -0 -&gt; 1 (CMN with 0 immediate) transitions by</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00261" /><CodeLine lineNumber="261"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// adjusting compare instruction opcode.</span></CodeLine>
